title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and end-users.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, user interface, and integration with existing systems. Ensure scalability, maintainability, and modularity. Consider security, performance, and error handling.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user goals, journeys, and related data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for managing user data, goals, and journeys.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for creating, editing, and visualizing goal journeys.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement secure authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms. This should include user registration, login, password management, role-based access control, data encryption at rest and in transit, and secure communication protocols. Additionally, implement security best practices such as input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL injection).

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guide
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers and end-users, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals.
